<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Deduce the least significant bit aligned shift and mask values for a binary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Complement \\p Value (as they&#39;re defined in SIDefines.h as C&#95;&#42;) as a returned</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">/// pair&lt;shift, mask&gt;. That is to say \\p Value == ~(mask &lt;&lt; shift)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For example, given C&#95;00B848&#95;FWD&#95;PROGRESS (i.e., 0x7FFFFFFF) from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// SIDefines.h, this will return the pair as (31,1).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#abc35cd2c7c1b70aedaf4e2cd857688ab"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#abc35cd2c7c1b70aedaf4e2cd857688ab">getShiftMask</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shift = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the masked and left shifted, in said order of operations, MCExpr &#42; created</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// within the MCContext \\p Ctx.</Highlight></CodeLine>
